mapper.select: select id, hosp_code, code, name, usage_code, dept_code, type_code, biz_code, way_code, is_valid, crte_id, crte_name, crte_time, is_first from base_assist where id = #{id} and hosp_code= #{hospCode}
mapper.insert: insert into base_assist(id,hosp_code,is_first, code, name, usage_code, dept_code, type_code, biz_code, way_code, is_valid, crte_id, crte_name, crte_time) values (#{id}, #{hospCode}, #{isFirst}, #{code}, #{name}, #{usageCode}, #{deptCode}, #{typeCode}, #{bizCode}, #{wayCode}, '1', #{crteId}, #{crteName}, #{crteTime})
mapper.delete: delete from base_assist where id = #{id} and hosp_code= #{hospCode}
